text: today's recipe is maybe the most
over-the-top thing I have made in ages
it's a black forest cake milkshake I'm
starting off by making some boozy

as the sour cherries so it's a cup of
sour cherry juice with two cups of sugar
and you want to make a syrup out of that
to cook your cherries in just cook the
sugar and the cherry juice together
until it comes to a simmer while you're
waiting for that to come to a simmer you
can make a glaze for your donuts now
this is also optional because I'm using

but I wanted them to have a cherry glaze
so I'm making a cherry glaze to go on

in this bowl and to that add about two

them turn it off and for the boozy part
of the boozy cherries a couple of

Kirschwasser
those are your Serra cherries they just
